mapper.sql: id, modified, username, phone, realname, clazz, sno, dormitory, gender, createtime, avatar
mapper.select: select id FROM where phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR} limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into (id, modified, username, phone, realname, clazz, sno, dormitory, gender, createtime, avatar) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{modified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clazz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sno,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{dormitory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gender,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{avatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

update

where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
